Wordle Stats Editor - Elevate Your Wordle Experience!
🎉 Discover the Ultimate Companion for Wordle Enthusiasts!

Wordle has taken the world by storm, and now it's time to take your Wordle gameplay to the next level with the Wordle Stats Editor extension! This handy tool allows you to track and modify your game statistics seamlessly, offering a more enriched and personalized gaming experience.

Key Features:

🎚️ Customizable Game Settings: Easily toggle between dark and light modes to suit your preference.
📊 Edit Your Stats: Keep track of your gaming statistics with editable fields for average guesses, current streak, games played, and more.
📝 Game Board Editor: Customize the game board state to your liking, providing a fresh perspective on your Wordle strategies.
💾 Save Your Progress: Don't worry about losing your data - save your game statistics securely with a single click.
Why Choose the Wordle Stats Editor Extension?

User-Friendly Interface: With an easy-to-navigate UI, you can edit your stats without any hassle.
Lightweight & Fast: The extension doesn't slow down your browsing experience; it's designed to be efficient and speedy.
Privacy-Centric: We respect your privacy. The extension does not collect or store any personal data.
Disclaimer: Wordle Stats Editor is an independent extension and is not affiliated with Wordle or The New York Times Company in any way.

Get ready to enhance your Wordle gaming experience with the Wordle Stats Editor extension. Download now and start gaming like a pro!
